workshop.title: Cloud Devops Automation Using Chef and Jenkins
workshop.description:
In this Workshop you will compile code, build environments in the cloud, and deploy the code into the new environment. You will assemble this pipeline leveraging Developer Cloud Service, Jenkins, Oracle Cloud
Orchestrations, and Chef.

labs.title: Lab 100: Devops: Automation using Chef and Jenkins
labs.description: Build and deploy code leveraging Developer Cloud Service, Jenkins, Orchestrations and Chef.
